metadata.title: CVE-2017-11684 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
There is an illegal address access in the build_table function inlibavcodec/bitstream.c of Libav 12.1 that will lead to remote denial ofservice via crafted input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:3.0-1
libav-tools - 7:3.0-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:3.0-1
libavcodec-extra57 - 7:3.0-1
libavcodec57 - 7:3.0-1
libavdevice57 - 7:3.0-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:3.0-1
libavfilter-extra6 - 7:3.0-1
libavfilter6 - 7:3.0-1
libavformat57 - 7:3.0-1
libavresample3 - 7:3.0-1
libavutil55 - 7:3.0-1
libpostproc54 - 7:3.0-1
libswresample2 - 7:3.0-1
libswscale4 - 7:3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:3.0-1').
